snippet.title: Spirit Interlude - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2243070/Spirit_Interlude/
Media Kit: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1RfZL0mxj9bnzhin7QeCnznF8MB-V0sN4?usp=sharing

Spirit Interlude is a gentle turn based strategy game with autobattler mechanics. Set in a calm nature environment full of little spirits to discover and add to your team. Play highly tactical or randomly/relaxed, but always take your time and enjoy the happy interlude!
